text: The US wars in the Middle East since 9/11 have cost $6+ trillion dollars and led to 800,000+ deaths. Given especially the recent sudden withdrawal from Afghanistan, this is heartbreaking.

Here's my conversation with Jaron Lanier, founder of the field of virtual reality and outspoken critic of social media platforms as he argues in his book "Ten Arguments for Deleting Your Social Media Accounts Right Now". https://t.co/h9hixuVzbf https://t.co/FAW9ZBWlsR

More than 80% of the ocean is still unexplored.

Here's my conversation with @rodneyabrooks, one of the greatest roboticists of all time, having co-founded iRobot, Rethink Robotics, Robust-AI, and before that serving as director of the MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory. https://t.co/iIzat1V4rF https://t.co/yC3ntXGp1W

Here's my conversation with Vincent Racaniello (@profvrr), a virologist and microbiologist at Columbia, co-host of This Week in Virology, and one of best educators of biology and science that I've ever spoken to. We talk all about viruses and vaccines. https://t.co/JjHX5NI6Ee https://t.co/szCvZAVirb
